module.name: Bria Cloud Solutions
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE AND Bria Cloud Solutions SUBSCRIPTION FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. This module manages and configures Bria Cloud Solutions.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.14* - #8399 - Ensure we are display the reload bar after changes are made *2.11.0.12* #8193 - Update Add Users Link *2.11.0.11* Fix issue with userman being disabled *2.11.0.9* Fix from admin name and groupName being different *2.11.0.8* Module.xml cleanup *2.11.0.7* Fix info link in module.xml *2.11.0.6* More copy changes *2.11.0.5* More copy changes *2.11.0.4* Copy changes *2.11.0.2* Cleanup Help Text *2.11.0.1* Fix issue with device deletion *1.0.0.0* Initial Build
